comment: FPPR Brand Configuration - Customize colors and styling for multi-restaurant usage

_documentation.accent_color: Primary brand color used for buttons, highlights, and focus states
_documentation.accent_color_light: Lighter variant of accent color for hover states
_documentation.accent_color_dark: Darker variant of accent color for active states
_documentation.secondary_color: Secondary color for accents and complementary elements
_documentation.border_radius: CSS border-radius value for rounded corners
_documentation.logo_url: Future: URL to brand logo image
_documentation.priority: JSON file > PHP constants > apply_filters('fppr_brand_config') > defaults
_documentation.global_override: Place this file in wp-content/fppr-brand.json for site-wide overrides
